name: youtube-download-server
description: A simplified YouTube downloader server using Bun and yt-dlp

scripts.dev: bun run build:ui && bun run --watch src/index.ts
scripts.build:ui: mkdir -p public/assets && bunx @tailwindcss/cli -i ui/styles.css -o public/assets/app.css --minify && bun build ui/main.tsx --outfile public/assets/app.js --minify --target=browser --format=esm
scripts.build: bun run build:ui && bun run build:server
scripts.start: bun run build:ui && bun run src/index.ts
